titleStmt.title: The vanity of childhood & youth wherein the depraved nature of young people is represented and means for their reformation proposed : being some sermons preached in Hand-Alley at the request of several young men, to which is added a catechism for youth / by Daniel Williams.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Daniel, 1643?-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
